descriptions.title: An Overview of the Translator’s Homage Section
descriptions.content: This is a short statement consisting of the object of homage (a Buddha, Bodhisattva, teacher, or whomever is held in high religious esteem) followed by ཕྱག་འཚལ་ལོ་. This is usually a brief homage in prose (not verse), with just the object of homage followed by ཕྱག་འཚལ་ལོ་. Example: འཇམ་དཔལ་གཞོན་ནུར་གྱུར་པ་ལ་ཕྱག་འཚལ་ལོ་.
